songs.title: Say Ahh!!!
songs.lyrics:
Say Ahh Remix

[Intro]
Now We Got
Lil Crazed
Traphik
D-Pryde
J Reyez…
Haha and its me J.R.A

[Hook:JRA]
Go girl
Its your birthday
Open wide, I know you're thirsty
Say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
Say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
We don't buy no drinks at the bar
We pop champagne cuz we got that dough
Let me hear you say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
If you want me say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)

[D-Pryde]
Champagne For a Minor I got my doses
She move real slow so my thoughts like lotion
I ain’t too young to pop that rose
Knocked up Bars, no im not Seth Rogen
The girl ima raidor no im not like Oakland
My verses kinda hot like im on some pot and stow shit
Blame it all on the alcohol lets go
If your feeling what im drinking crank your jaw wide open
Take a picture chick
I ain’t on a boat bitch, put me on some Santana champ cuz its so cripsy
And the drinks got me speaking like clara clara clara
But im sounding like a scratch like a ara ara ara
So baby put your hands in the air(a) air(a) air(a)
Im the man you know micheal cera cera cera?
Im happy in the bedroom, baby I be bugging out
Baby say aah, it ain't the alkaline you sucking on but my dick

[Hook:JRA]
Go girl
Its your birthday
Open wide, I know you're thirsty
Say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
Say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
We don't buy no drinks at the bar
We pop champagne cuz we got that dough
Let me hear you say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
If you want me say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)

(Crazed: 2nd verse)
~1 shot, 2 shots, aww u know the rest now
My confession, my intention? help u drop ya dress down
Fiddle a lil to make it whistle like a ref sound
And the way you get it "up", I'm sure I can't be let "down"
Wow, work it like assistants
We can get it, I can hit it, we dont need commitment
Skip the digits, look delicious, I cannot resist it
Excuse me miss but this is just a one night visit
And don't forget it, make ya gifted on ya birthday
Ya jaw looking dry, lift it if ya thirstay
And say "ahh" even if you're scared to
Just say "ahh" kinda like I scared you BOO
Ha, i'll give you something to see
But u know me, i'll take it to another degree
Cuz I'mma bachelor but I'm gon' give you the master's
And make you say "ahh" like you just seen casper!

[Hook:JRA]
Go girl
Its your birthday
Open wide, I know you're thirsty
Say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
Say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
We don't buy no drinks at the bar
We pop champagne cuz we got that dough
Let me hear you say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
If you want me say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)

[J.Reyez]
Tragic Glory, what up
It’s the J R E Y E Z
Go Girl, it’s your birthday
What’s your favorite drink, I’m just doing a little survey
No Cold but I’m just trying to get my flow sicker
In the club, im on a roll, ima go getta
See a girl looking fine then a mo licker
I can tell by the swag, she a gold digger
Baby girl you can’t try with the wink
Im J.Reyez, whatcha think Im buy a drink for ya?
Gulping shots of red bull and vodka
Its 2010 ain't nobody that can stop us
Uhh, my head spinning like a merry go
She giving me her number, pin it to my blackberry phone
She got it going on with the great looks
She take a pic and uploaded on her facebook
Headed for her place for the night and she tweet about it
Next day, she feeling right she won’t forget about it

[Hook:JRA]
Go girl
Its your birthday
Open wide, I know you're thirsty
Say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
Say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
We don't buy no drinks at the bar
We pop champagne cuz we got that dough
Let me hear you say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
If you want me say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)

(Traphik: 4th verse)
Now once upon a time not long ago
There was chic that was a lady and she wasn't a ho
But then I bought a couple shots and I squeezed her behind
She started liftin up her skirt and proceeded to grind
I said im not that type of guy thats gonna buy you a car
Im just tryna to take you to the crib and make you a star
I got a camera, the stamina, a whip and some chains
How bout we smack it up rip it down and sip on some pain (champagne)
See I grind all day and at night I play hard
And I never hit it raw, I dont want a JR
Crazed when I wanted it, and started to reyez
So I smashed it like it some traphik and she swallowed my pryde
Its ya birthday baby you can do what you want
You ain't a ho, u just partyin and havin some fun
This ain't a one night stand, shawty you is a ten
So just hit me up next week and we can do it again

[Hook:JRA]
Go girl
Its your birthday
Open wide, I know you're thirsty
Say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
Say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
We don't buy no drinks at the bar
We pop champagne cuz we got that dough
Let me hear you say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
If you want me say Aah (Aah, Aah, Aah, Aah)
